name: pwd
description: Return the current working directory path.

name: ls
description: List the contents of the current directory.

a.description: Show hidden files and directories. Defaults to False.

response.name: current_directory_content
response.description: A list of the contents of the specified directory.

name: cd
description: Change the current working directory to the specified folder.

folder.description: The folder of the directory to change to. You can only change one folder at a time.

response.name: current_working_directory
response.description: The new current working directory path.

name: mkdir
description: Create a new directory in the current directory.

dir_name.description: The name of the new directory at current directory. You can only create directory at current directory.

name: touch
description: Create a new file in the current directory.

file_name.description: The name of the new file in the current directory. file_name is local to the current directory and does not allow path.

name: echo
description: Write content to a file at current directory or display it in the terminal.

content.description: The content to write or display.

file_name.description: The name of the file at current directory to write the content to. Defaults to None.

response.name: terminal_output
response.description: The content if no file name is provided, or None if written to file.

name: cat
description: Display the contents of a file from currrent directory.

file_name.description: The name of the file from current directory to display. No path is allowed.

name: find
description: Find any file or directories under specific path that contain name in its file name.  This method searches for files and directories within a specified path that match the given name. If no name is provided, it returns all files and directories in the specified path and its subdirectories.

path.description: The directory path to start the search. Defaults to the current directory (".").

name.description: The name of the file or directory to search for. If None, all items are returned.

name: wc
description: Count the number of lines, words, and characters in a file from current directory.

file_name.description: Name of the file of current directory to perform wc operation on.

mode.description: Mode of operation ('l' for lines, 'w' for words, 'c' for characters).

name: sort
description: Sort the contents of a file line by line.

file_name.description: The name of the file appeared at current directory to sort.

response.name: sorted_content
response.description: The sorted content of the file.

name: grep
description: Search for lines in a file at current directory that contain the specified pattern.

file_name.description: The name of the file to search. No path is allowed and you can only perform on file at local directory.

name: xargs
description: Execute a command with arguments read from a file or standard input.

command.description: The command to execute with arguments.

file_name.description: The file containing arguments. Defaults to None.

response.name: output
response.description: The result of the command execution.

name: du
description: Estimate the disk usage of a directory and its contents.

human_readable.description: If True, returns the size in human-readable format (e.g., KB, MB).

name: tail
description: Display the last part of a file.

file_name.description: The name of the file to display. No path is allowed and you can only perform on file at local directory.

lines.description: The number of lines to display from the end of the file. Defaults to 10.

response.name: last_lines
response.description: The last part of the file.

name: diff
description: Compare two files line by line at the current directory.

file_name1.description: The name of the first file in current directory.

file_name2.description: The name of the second file in current directorry.

response.name: diff_lines
response.description: The differences between the two files.

name: mv
description: Move a file or directory from one location to another. so

source.description: Source name of the file or directory to move. Source must be local to the current directory.

destination.description: The destination name to move the file or directory to. Destination must be local to the current directory and cannot be a path.

response.name: result
response.description: The result of the move operation.

file_name.description: The name of the file or directory to remove.

response.name: result
response.description: The result of the remove operation.

name: rmdir
description: Remove a directory at current directory.

dir_name.description: The name of the directory to remove. Directory must be local to the current directory.

response.name: result
response.description: The result of the remove operation.

name: cp
description: Copy a file or directory from one location to another.  If the destination is a directory, the source file or directory will be copied into the destination directory.  Both source and destination must be local to the current directory.

source.description: The name of the file or directory to copy.

destination.description: The destination name to copy the file or directory to.

response.name: result
response.description: The result of the copy operation or an error message if the operation fails.
